cause.description:
for all the people that love supporting pointless issues in order to remain liked in society by the red hat lady convention.
1. Ribbons have become the new post 9 11 flagship bandwagon
2. Buying a ribbon is easier then voting seriously, and they look great too.
3. Sarcasm is wasted on the stiffs
cause.mission: suport the supportment of purchasing support the troops ribbons in order to keep supporting our faulty government's preemptiveness.
cause.name: Support buying support the troops ribbons
